formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SpeechLoadGrammar' =-
[Synopsis] Load a Grammar
[Description] SpeechLoadGrammar(Grammar Name|Path) Load a grammar only on the channel, not globally. It takes the grammar name as first argument and path as second.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,6 @@ Load a Grammar
[Description] - SpeechLoadGrammar(Grammar Name|Path) + SpeechLoadGrammar(Grammar Name,Path): Load a grammar only on the channel, not globally. It takes the grammar name as first argument and path as second.
